## DYNAMIC\_FORM\_DEFAULT\_OPTIONS variable

A token for providing default configuration options for dynamic forms

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DYNAMIC_FORM_DEFAULT_OPTIONS: InjectionToken<DynamicFormDefaultOptions>
```
